events.message: A claim was filed regarding a collision involving the insured's vehicle hitting a tree on May 1st.
The claim was reviewed and categorized under 'Auto Accident' due to the involvement of a car collision.
An insurance agent has been assigned to manage the case and communicate with the claimant.
The claim has been officially acknowledged by the insurance company, and confirmation sent to the customer.
The customer was asked to provide photos of the damaged vehicle and police collision report for investigation.
Claimant submitted all requested documents including vehicle damage photos and official police report promptly.
The investigation team began reviewing all evidence and conducting interviews related to the vehicle accident.
Investigation completed concluding that the claimant was not at fault in the collision involving their vehicle.
The insurance company proposed a settlement amount covering vehicle repair costs and rental car reimbursement.
The customer expressed satisfaction with the proposed settlement and appreciated the quick resolution process.
The claim has been approved officially, authorizing disbursal of the settlement amount to the claimant.
Settlement payment was issued and transferred to the claimant's bank account as per agreement.
This auto accident claim case was officially closed following payment disbursal and customer confirmation.
All claim related documents were archived in the insurance system for future reference and regulatory compliance.
